page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE IN LANGTOFT
page.content: It was my birthday,I was going to be nine.Two of my friends were coming to Peterborough with me to watch Indiana Jones at the cinema.Deana was late,so we went on,hoping that we would meet her on the way to pick up Michelle. Just as we got off our drive,Deana's car came round the bend, she gave me a wooden doll.Deana's mum took us to the crossroads and Michelle was there waiting for us.Soon the bus came we decided to go to the back seat,so that we could wave to the cars behind us.It was busy at Queensgate and we nearly got lost.We all had some money so we went to a newsagents and bought A My Little Pony each.It was time to go to the cinema,so we decided to make our way to it.It was hot in the cinema,so we got some drinks.The film was good and soon it was the end,we went to the bus station and got the bus.by A.Birch
